result.Case Summary:
FINANCIAL INDUSTRY REGULATORY AUTHORITY OFFICE OF HEARING OFFICERS Department of Enforcement, Complainant, v. Paul James Marshall (CRD No. 1889692), Respondent. COMPLAINT The Department of Enforcement alleges: SUMMARY 1. Paul James Marshall converted funds totaling $25,000 from a firm customer, by accepting two checks for investment and failing to either invest those funds as directed, or return them to the customer, in violation of NASD Conduct Rules 2330 and 2110. Marshall also used an unapproved business
